name: C-40R Coalition
raw_snippet: C-40R Coalition SAMAS Rail Gun The SAMAS rail gun is listed here because it has been widely dup- licated (the CS is not pleased by this) and is light enough to be used as a vehicle mounted or tripod mounted machinegun. Weight: 92 lbs (41.4 kg), Power Pack: 60 lbs (27 kg), One Ammo-Belt: 30 lbs (13.5 kg), Case of six belts: 190 lbs (85.5 kg). Mega-Damage: A burst is 40 rounds and inflicts 1D4X 10 M.D., one round does 1D4 M.D. Rate of Fire: Standard, see Modern Weapon Proficiency Section. Maximum Effective Range: 4000 feet (1200 m) Payload: As a machinegun: 400 round belt. A.T.V. Speedster Black Market Cost: 110,000 credits. Rarely available.
